Content:: Gayashan Nawananda (Sinhala: ගයාශාන් නවනන්ද; born 25 March 1990) is a Sri Lankan physician, politician and Member of Parliament.[1] Nawananda was born on 25 March 1990.[1] He has a degree in medicine from the Rajarata University of Sri Lanka.[2] He was Chief Medical Officer at Hambegamuwa Regional Hospital.[2] Nawananda contested the 2020 parliamentary election as a Sri Lanka People's Freedom Alliance electoral alliance candidate in Monaragala District and was elected to the Parliament of Sri Lanka.[3][4][5]  This article about a politician from Uva Province, Sri Lanka is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
Title: Gayashan Nawananda - Wikipedia
